FuncDef: This command specifies the import policies to be used to control routes advertised to BGP neighbors. Route policies are configured in theconfig>router>policy-optionscontext. When multiple policy names are specified, the policies are evaluated in the order they are specified. The first policy that matches is applied.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies route policy statement name up to 32 characters. Up to five policies can be specified.

ExtraInfo: Default: no import - BGP accepts all routes from configured BGP neighbors. Import policies can be used to limit or modify the routes accepted and their corresponding parameters and metrics.
